item.title: Filecoin Ecosystem Metrics Roundup: Building a Data-Driven Foundation for Growth
item.description: Welcome to the inaugural edition of the Filecoin Ecosystem Metrics Roundup, a monthly series designed to align our community around the metrics that matter most for sustainable ecosystem growth.

item.title: Filecoin News 111
item.description: Filecoin is evolving from a supply-focused network to one increasingly defined by real usage, paying clients, and long-term sustainability.

item.title: Introducing Proof of Data Possession (PDP): Verifiable Hot Storage on Filecoin
item.description: Filecoin introduces verifiable hot storage with Proof of Data Possession, enabling fast, on-demand access while maintaining cryptographic integrity.
